tripleplay.ui

Interface Scroller.BarRenderer

  • Enclosing class:
    Scroller

    public static interface Scroller.BarRenderer
    Draws a scroll bar onto a surface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawBar(Surface surface, pythagoras.f.Rectangle area)
      Draws the bar of the given area.

    • Method Detail

      • drawBar

        void drawBar(Surface surface,
           pythagoras.f.Rectangle area)
        Draws the bar of the given area. The fill color if the surface is set to the resolved Scroller.BAR_COLOR style. Surface.save() and restore are called automatically. TODO: we may want an orientation passed too
